place_description: Tous les Jours means "every day"in French.Tous les Jours is a "French-Asian-inspired" bakery primarily serving a selection of baked goods and beverages.

reviews_data.review_text: Nice and cute cafe with delicious bakery! Interior is stunning and quite interesting. Fantastic selection of sweets and savory pastries. Everything is so delicious !

Tous les Jours is really good in terms of the varities offered, coffee, savouries and the service. The ambience is extremely calm and soothing with very positive vibe as soon as you enter. The Ube Drink, Tiramisu Latte and Cloud Pastry were two of my most favourite things to definitely try.
Very rude staff especially the cashier, I can't eat anything!!!

Very clean beautiful bakery. However I was not assisted or given any info. The employees were just chilling until they finally noticed me. The garlic croissant was delicious as well as the Milk-Bread and red bean past doughnut.

Update: I love this bakery. Lowkey every thing in my first review is still true, but the desserts make up for the lack of help. I always wing it and try new things.
Eto maia liubimaia kofeinia. Vsio ochen' svezhie i vkusnoe, osobenno novinka sosiski v teste ponravilis' moei docheri
staff is so nice, and the place is sparkling clean. Definitely be back. variety of bread and bakery. real Korean authentic!! 10 out 10

They were out of most of their pastries and drinks by 5:30PM, their staff's services is very poor. I have been to this location three times and I have poor service every time. I drive 2 hours to make it to Charlotte. Not fair.
I love all the choices! Everything was good. I will definitely be back.
Mehhhh.  Nothing like Paris baguette.
Place looks great. Great desserts and love their coffee as well. Good place sit and chat while enjoying the sweet & savory snacks.

What a quaint place! Like a little slice of France in Charlotte. The food and coffee are both very solid. The staff are so nice - even making sure our little one's needs were met (we needed ice - very sweet and solid service). Very much recommend getting a slice of cake with your coffee.
Great vibes, fresh baked goods and great hospitality! Definitely will be back

This is my favorite place for Green Tea Cloud Cake. It is so light and fluffy and has just the right amount of Green Tea and sugar. My boyfriend picked this up, but considering the craftmanship and taste, it is a gem bakery of Southpark.They have such a nice presentation of delicious fruit on the top and one layer that has whipped cream and strawberries. So yummy! They even give you a spatula (plastic) to cut the cake and candles. Perfect for any special occasion. We shared with a friend I had not seen in a while. I will be back to try other things as they also have breads and pastries! Great place!
Love the decor and the ambiance. Delicious but get there early if you want the entire pick of the assortment.
The service is great! The man behind the counter, Simon, was so helpful and friendly! I'll definitely be back

Came in to wfh. This is a super cute area and has a great upstairs loft. Simon helped me out and gave me great recommendations on the pastries and drinks! He also helped me with the WiFi and answered some of my stupid questions. Super patient with me and he was super nice! I'll honestly come back and be a regular because of the service! Great place to wfh at internet was fast and the noise level wasn't too loud.
Meh. The chocolate and strawberry cloud cake was wonderful. The latte and 'iced chocolate" tasted like dishwater and the little man behind the counter was rude.

Most beautiful coffee shop i've ever been to! The service was exceptional, the handsome young man nicolas with glasses and curly hair and cute little bandana has great customer service, he is incredibly kind and considerate! Would definitely come back to this establishment, 10/10. The pastries are incredibly delicious and reasonably priced!

What a fabulous bakery!! You can really tell this is a popular stop on a Sunday afternoon as they were quite low on inventory. Even so, my friend and I thoroughly enjoyed our selected treats and drinks. There is plenty of seating with additional in a loft overlooking the shop. The service was exceptional- friendly smiles all around with one attendant giving individual care to answer multiple questions and suggestions. Absolutely delicious coffee- Honey lavender macchiato with half/half gets a full blown chef kiss! Will be back!
Food is way over priced.
Excellent bakery with unlimited choices.   Highly recommend.
1st time here and host was very nice. She helped us pick out some treats and described some flavors for us. The cloud bread and croquet were delicious!
The products are very delicious but the cleanliness leaves much to be desired: dirty tables, dirty floors, I was disappointed
We come here once a month and get at least a dozen pastries. They have a large selection and we still have so much left to try. The kimchi croquet is worth trying ..!

Everything is great about this place and always had a good experience. Just today, the server (Asian with glasses and tattoos), very rude and doesn't even want to help the customers. I understand you're tired but why do you blame the customers for actually helping boost the coffee shop's income and indirectly pay your salary.
idk if they're really making these in the back bc you can fooled by anyone nowadays but wow someone is putting a lot of effort into these cakes
Great place! The quality was high and the bread was fluffy and nice. Mango cream filled Croissant was unlike anything I've tried was super good!
So cute and yummy! Very clean and cozy! Even has extra seating upstairs! I'm coming back to try the sandwiches!
Nice location, affordable price, decent size treat and very tasty. Will be back!
Amazing. A bit expensive but the experience was worth it.

hol keikeu, aiseu amerikano sikyeossneunde badeureo gani eoleumi bujoghaeseo eoleum jogeumman neoheossda(badassneunde eoleum hanado eobsgo ddaddeusham)-> eoleummulirado julgga? (eoleummule eoleumeun eodiseo..?)-> geunyang johge meogeuryeogo haessneunde eoleummule geomjeongsaeg deoreoun jjiggeogiga dungdungddeum -> hwanbul yoceong -> eoleum naega eobsdago haessji anhnago yeogeuro ddajim -> aiseu donjugo gumaehaessgo deoreoun ge ddeodanineunde eoddeohge meogjyo? -> ggeutggaji sagwa eobseum;
Our favorite! Cloud cakes and strawberry croissants are the best here!

Delicious food, but customer service...I guess more interested in their phones than customers. I needed a dozen of macaroons and it was no customers around, except me, I called employees 3 times, no replies, keep watching their phones. Any other time I would let it go, but that day I was in a hurry. Cashier was very rude (I guess it was something very interesting in her phone and I interrupted her). Message to the owner - please train your employees, with such a "service level" you won't succeed. I really like this place and food but employees with such an attitude just killing it.
Delicious pastries and bread! The caramel mocha was also so good. My only complaint would be that I live too far away to visit all the time!
I love the atmosphere. I will back again
One of the highest quality bakery out there. It's fresh and never disappoints. Love the experience everytime I go there.

My family's favorite place to get a treat! Food and drinks are impeccable. Staff is so kind and attentive, they always have a smile for my children and engage with them. We've never had a bad experience here and come often.
Very delicious. Highly recommended..

**Bakery Review: Tous Les Jours - Southpark**

Tous Les Jours in Southpark is an absolute gem of a bakery, located conveniently near Bentley's Restaurant and attached to a parking deck. The beautiful entrance and modern, well-lit interior set the stage for an extraordinary experience the moment you walk in.

As you step inside, you're immediately greeted by a dazzling display of baked goods in well-lit cases. The sight is nothing short of mesmerizing, showcasing the bakery's incredible pastries and bread designs. It's clear that a significant amount of care and time goes into creating each intricate piece. The carving into the breads before baking results in exquisite designs that are truly a feast for the eyes once baked.

The attention to detail and craftsmanship in every item is evident, making it impossible not to admire the artistry on display. The baked goods are not only visually stunning but also mouth-wateringly delicious.

My wife and I were fascinated by our visit and were pleasantly surprised to discover such a high-quality bakery in Southpark. This bakery is now a must-visit for us whenever we are in the area for dinner. We can't wait to return for more delightful desserts.

Thank you so much to the Tous Les Jours team for an unforgettable experience. We look forward to many more visits!
Excellent service. Pleasant environment. Nice place for a snack and coffee.

A younger lady that was a cashier was rude and nasty to a customer in front of us. The cashier gave the wrong amount back to that customer while the cashier was too busy touching her phone. Horrible customer service and we will not he coming back. .

Came here while in line the cashier was arguing with a customer because the cashier was at fault for giving the wrong amount back to the customer while not paying attention. Instead of apologizing, the cashier talked back to the customer. This is unprofessional, and the cashier would've gotten away with it and took the money if the customer didn't check the amt given back to her
What a pleasant surprise to find a Korean bakery in Charlotte!!! Bread options were quite authentic Korean, while I found the coffee was disappointing (from dispenser).
Disappointed service. There were plenty of employees around, but they were all busy chatting with each other. Left to another nearby business.

I came here today, and I gave the cashier  $50 bill
She put down that I gave her $20, and my change was $3. She was so quick to go back to her PHONE. I asked her nicely and said ma'am I gave you a $50 bill and she argued saying no I didn't and that it was a $20 bill when she opened the cash register and another lady came behind her (her coworker or supervisor idk who) and that lady said it was a $50 to the cash register.

The register started moving her head and giving me an attitude. I told her she didn't have to give me an attitude and start moving her head. I just want my money that she owes me.
She turned around and said no, she didn't give me an attitude and accused me that i started it first. I told her no I didn't and I just want my money and IF she wasn't in such a rush to touch her phone and paid attention to the money I gave her then she wouldn't had messed up and I told her she needs customer service experience as she clearly DONT HAVE ANY.
How are you going to try to argue with a customer when YOU ARE CLEARLY in the wrong here? Her coworker told her she needed to STOP because she was clearly trying to argue that she wasn't in the wrong. She never apologized for her wrongdoing. She probably was trying to STEAL my money if I wasn't careful enough to check how much i was given back.
You just lost a loyal customer.
DO NOT GO HERE.

There were gnats flying all around inside the food display case where the bread pastries were. Disgusting, I left and didn't buy anything. There was also barely any cake and cheesecake which is what I came for. What I did see was tiny slices for a high price.
Food and drinks were amazing. Loved the ambiance. Only downside was the employees were kinda rude , maybe they were having a rough day . I'll come again at another time of day!

What a beautiful looking bakery, and the footprint is fairly large inside. There is a 2nd level that you can work/study/people watch while you enjoy your bread or a cup of coffee.
This place has a French name but it is Asian link. Bread is soft and the dessert is not very sweet. That's a tell tell sign. Also they sell bake goods that have red bean or matcha in them. If you have a more Asian taste, which is lighter than Americans then you would love this shop.
It is a chain bakery but top quality . Don't get the premade package cake though, those are dry
Parking is free in a garage nearby so don't worry about parking

So the place is cute and the bread is wonderful, but it supposed to closet at 8:00pm and every time y go after job that is 5:30pm the ladies has everything clean and apparently they don't serve frappes after 5:00pm cause they already wash the machine they used for frappes , bad services.
Is better is they just close at 5:00pm like that we can just found another place to go after business hours.
Delicious desserts, clean bakery, nice atmosphere.

I absolutely adore this place. The environment is so chill and super cute. The bakery is beyond amazing, the cakes, and so many different pastries, ahh it is all so delicious.  The coffees and teas are amazing as well.
Ordered the strawberry cloud cake for my daughter's birthday. Cake was awesome. Service was stellar. Cake came with the coolest cuter with matches in the handle. Saved me another trip. Thanks!
Quick and Effortless!

Clean and elegant atmosphere with a new delicious treat around every corner. I went with a macaron and a croissant it is hard to decide which one was better. If you are trying to find a great dessert look no further! Their cakes look amazing!
My favorite spot for desserts

Overall, it's a cute spot, but cleanliness could be better.
I ordered a strawberry matcha but it was not the best, compared to other places. I was disappointed! I will potentially come back for some coffee and try to give it another chance.
Macaroons were super good though!

The windows and window rails could all use some cleaning as they were very dirty with fingerprints/smudges. Women restroom as well- had water over the whole sink top.
Loved the mango cloud cake and ube latte!

food and coffee was great but one of the baristas yelled at me for accidentally grabbing the wrong drink and even after i apologized and put it back she continued to be rude to me. Iv never had someone working in customer service be so disrespectful. As someone who also works in customer service I was shocked. If I spoke to someone like that I would definitely get written up.
Delicious as always, but this was by far the best atmosphere in the locations that I've visited. The Mango cream doughnut was delicious.
Well organized

I've gone several times and most times have issues with the drink. Between always being out of seasonal drinks, getting a medium when ordered and paid for a large, offered to make another (cheaper) drink when you ordered and paid for the most expensive drink. It's unfortunate that a cafe can't handle making drinks.
Clean, friendly, efficient service
The croissants were incredible. We had the strawberry and whipped cream croissant and the chocolate croissant. Both were exceptional! Fun sitting area and super friendly staff!
The bread choices here are really great. Different from your usual bagels and sandwiches. I tried a few and also the cake here is wonderful.

I had to take my mother on a road trip for surgery and we got there a bit early. I looked up and saw the title on the building and at a quick Google glance thought: "coffee shop with donuts and stuff" which actually was perfect in that simplicity. I walked in and was blown away by the array of colors and culinary treats. This meager line chef was suddenly a kid in a lego shop. The display cases just have to be seen and enjoyed in person even you dont do the whole "food is art" thing. Its the same joy of an ice creme shop with all the flavors except each flavor is an entirely different item. Willy Wonka music playing in your head and all that.  I had so many culinary questions and wanted to run around in their kitchen screaming "wooooooooooooow neat" but I sadly didn't have time and just didnt have out of state bail money.  Surgery was soon. The few things I grabbed would take longer than this thing will let me type to review. I'll just sum it up:  I will 100% make the 1 hour and some change drive  through a maze of school busses and SUVS to try new things in the future. I'm still drooling at the cakes on thier website.  Pink strawberry bread forever.
What a top shelf experience tasting an elegant variety of pastries. Lounge chair seating made a comfortable mid afternoon gathering with family.
felt like I am in korea
Charlotte definitely needed more coffee shops. This is a nice addition.
Best donut I've had in my life. Can't go wrong with anything there. Ube latte is divine and so is the curry croquette.

Incredible selection of fresh, soft, flavorful pastries and breads!  We finished running a 5k in the area and went straight here for celebratory treats! The chocolate donut melted in the mouth but what was most memorable was the gorgeous flavor of the chocolate!  We also enjoyed an Ube Latte! I can't wait to come back!

Prices are actually really great when you compare to other cafe prices (like Amelie's) or even compared to donut shops!

Seating indoors is awesome!

Pricey, but if you're looking for really great pastries that are baked fresh every day, this is a go to. I'm pretty adventurous, and every one of the food items I have tried I did enjoy.

They have really good drinks, both hot or iced. Unfortunately- they took off the only caffeine free drink (that actually tastes good) off the menu. I ask about it every time I go, and I do go often & year round, but they just say "it's seasonal".  One time I went (this was a while ago), I asked about it again, and the barista who served me on that day told me that they honestly took it off the menu because it takes a lot of effort/ time to make. I told him that it was a bummer for me cause I can't have caffeine and that drink itself was the reason I started going to TLJ regularly in the first place. He said that he knew how to make it and offered to make it for me (it was slow at the time) which was super considerate. I told him not to worry about it because (I didn't want to be annoying) but I genuinely respect taking something off the menu for a reason like that.

All of the baristas and staff are super sweet and accommodating. I've tried all their caffeine free drinks and unfortunately none of them are to my personal taste, but they have always offered to change it or refund me. I appreciate the gesture, but I think part of going out to try new things comes with the risk that you might not like what you ordered.

Tous les Jours which means "every day" in French is a South Korean bakery franchise. This place is one of the finest bakeries with fantastic ambience. Coming to pastry section, We have ordered Guava Danish, Strawberry Croissant and Chocolate croissant. Guava Danish was the winner. Green tea cloud cake and choco cloud cake were light, mouth watering and goes very well with latte. Raisin bread was fluffy, aromatic and has the right amount of sweetness. Caramel cheesecake was little bit over sweet. Coming to coffee, Iced tiramisu latte, vanilla latte, lavender latte and cappuccino were outstanding.
The cakes are delicious and the croissants amazing.
Nice bakery, limited selection. Has a coffee shop so you can enjoy your dessert on site, but seating is awkward and limited. Definitely a grab and go place.
The food was not only beautiful but tasted wonderful. It was a bit pricey but for special occasions worth it. The coffee was very good.

Beautiful and small French bakery. I stopped by with my mother in law to get some pastries. We got about 5 pastries and 2 coffees and spent almost $32 which is not bad but not cheap either. I loved my iced latte and the chocolate croissant but the other pastries were not my favorite. The environment is very peaceful and cute!
Amazing experience!!

Horrible customer service - refused to give me a box because " the boxes were expensive" I wanted to buy more things but wasn't willing to put  another $40 worth of pastries in a bag so they could be destroyed - it doesn't matter how good the product is if you cannot get it home in one piece - I even offered to pay for a box instead of bag but was refused
Great selection, nice vibe, pastries are amazing!
Worse costumer service ever in USA!
Otlichnaia atmosfera! Vse vkusno ne pereslashcheno kak vkusniashki ,tak i napitki.

Great cafe and bakery in South Park! It's the perfect spot to meet up with friends (new and old) for coffee and sweet treats. They have classics like donuts and croissants and interest sweets like egg tarts, mochi rolls, and custards. Everything I've tried is delicious and they even have great coffee/teas. Highly recommend coming here for a light bite and a good chat.

Not suitable for working from as they don't have free wifi available.
I've been wanting to experience a true Patisserie and Tous les Jours hits the mark! It is all fresh and flavorful, expertly created, and plenty of options for everyone. We will definitely be back!
I went there for breakfast, good atmosphere,  staff was friendly and food was great, I really enjoyed the almond croissant.
Excellent service, the desserts are delicious as is the coffee. I am a coffee lover
CURRY CROQUETTES!! Delicious Japanese/French fusion baked goods, great selection of drinks and fantastic service and atmosphere!
service was great although they were busy and the barista was very diligent despite the rush and made our drinks very tasty! we will be coming back

I like their pastries and breads. But the service was not good. I think they need to train their staffs better. The staffs need to know the types of pastries the bakery has. She didn't know what the danish trio is. I ordered a honey lavender macchiato, and I got honey lavender matcha latte. Maybe she heard it wrong because it's always loud in there. The barista was very rude when I told her that she made the wrong drink. No apologies.

Love this place! It's a great spot to meet up with friends for some coffee and pastries. Definitely one of the first places that comes to mind when someone suggests getting breakfast, coffee, or pastries. I personally really enjoy their croquettes. Those are a great savory option! I'm not a coffee drinker but they have good hot tea options. Cute aesthetic!
If you are looking for great crossiant and other pastry, this is the place. Nice atmosphere too.

Very rude staff at this location. The person refilling the pasty area basically pushed my son out of her way with the tray she was holding and the cashier was extremely rude and condescending when we asked a question. This is the 2nd time the customer service was terrible so will not return to this location.

I went on a whim with some friends and it is hands down my new go to bakery. Not only was there great customer service but the food is AMAZING. The place is so cute too it looks straight out of pintrest I used to think Amelie's was unbeatable but it definitely has been beat.

One of the good bakery in Charlotte. It is our go to bakery for celebration. We always get cloud cake from here when we have birthday in our home. We also loved their croissants, macaroons. Milk bread is light and delicious.

Health hazard!
This is the first time we came across a slice of a moldy cake at this bakery (See the pic where it turned grey. It's supposed to be a light purple color). We frequently visit both Pineville and South Park locations. And yesterday I bought 2 slices of cake and one came moldy. They should be very careful about taking these bad items off the shelves.

I called the store and they offered a replacement but kids were so disappointed, don't want to go back to this location. We still love Tous les Jours, but will be very careful next time.

If you are a pastry and bakery lover this place is for you, big assortment  of sweets and treats, and beverages. One star down for my matcha tea that was barely warm when i got it, i didn't complain bc they were super busy with holiday crowd. Hope next visit will be better.

We bought a cake on December 30th for New Years but they only have few Holiday cake selections unlike on December 24th maybe because it's not New Years eve yet. We decided to just buy the Strawberry Cloud Cake and then we asked the lady who assisted us if we can ask for the "Happy Holiday" topper and she replied right away "I dont think so". Then she went to the lady who was preparing the cake on the corner and came back said "No, only for the Holiday cakes". The lady in the corner turned around and look at us bluntly and went back in preparing the cake. We were shocked for a $46 cake and for just a small topper they will treat us that way. To think on Thanksgiving Eve, we bought Ube Cloud Cake and they gave us the "Give Thanks" topper when we asked for it. And we always buy almost $200 everytime we go there since we are 30mins away from this place.  We like their cakes and pastries so we buy a lot everytime we are there. But, this time it seems that they are not in the mood to serve their customers. We are attaching photos of cakes that we bought these recent holidays, so that you'll see that their customer service are not consistent. Anyhow, we are not coming back!
Tudo muito bom.
Very basic and overpriced. Tea tasted slightly off and was dangerously hot. Hard pass.

I brought a green tea cake yesterday. One of my  fav cakes but dont know whats wrong with it.That tasted so bad i guess it had some issue with cream blending or not freshly made. This is the bad green tea cake i brought.

Very delicious. Note: they stop putting pastries out at 2pm. (We came at 6pm)
We bought breads and a little pastry that was $2.75 but were charged $5.75 for that pastry. We didn't notice till we were home.

Make sure to check your receipt:) We will be back though. Very nice staff and delicious breads!!

This place is perfect for a meeting with friends or to enjoy a cup of coffee with the most delicious croissants.  First off all the location is  a lot of free parking spaces, a cozy atmosphere, and the best pastries! You should definitely visit this place.

The macarons!!! My husband and I get macarons every time we go out of town and we love trying new places. Tours Les Jours has some of the best macarons we have ever had on the east coast. They're very fresh, the flavors are spot on, and the filling is perfectly moist. We'll definitely be back the next time we're in Charlotte.
Thumbs up!

This place has yummy deserts and coffee.
It is cozy and enjoyable to relax in.
Staff is kind except for when its busy and they are tired which I completely understand.
Didn't have any issues with anything and I will definitely be coming back !
Love this place!
Very tasty love the macarons and the cheesecake will be definitely coming back for more
I had the absolute best bakery item in my life at this place.  I think it was called French toast something.  I wish there was one closer to me. Ballantyne

Cute new bakery in South park. Festive for Christmas with fresh baked breads, macarons, cakes and pastries . Was a bit disappointed in the coffee and tea.
If they had a stronger, richer maybe authentic euro coffee I'd be more impressed. But cute hang out place for solo or groups.
Too expensive for the quality they provide..

Lugar bonito para disfrutar de bebidas y postres deliciosos.
Un ambiente acogedor para conversar con amigos, familia y pareja.
Great place to grab a fresh baked Danish (or two) and a hot beverage.
Hands down one of the best bakeries in SouthPark
Love the pastries

They have a variety of good French and Asian options. We got the custard bun and red bean paste bun which were perfect. The place looked nice to chill but It was too cold inside so we decided to leave.

LOVE this place. Amazing food and Ambiance. Love everything here !
Definitely recommend trying their kimchi or curry croquettes !

The stuff is super sweet
They give the best suggestions when it's hard to order something specific  also their kimchi pastry is THE BEST. special thanks to the best barista/cashier Daria she is super helpful every time !!!
Love their bakery
Love their cakes here. Asian sweetness level. Beautiful simple designs. Great for many occasions

You need to try this bakery. They have a ton of pastries to choose from and they are all 5 star. I had a mango cream filled donut which was so soft, fluffy, and delectable. Ordered a couple other pasties for family and friends too and they were outstanding. I got the tiramisu iced coffee and it was good but the cocoa on top was a little much
Now I have to take a shower
What a delightful place to enjoy a good cup of coffee and they have the most  delicious bakery! The place is very comfy, clean and staff is just great.
I go here for breakfast after my eye appt. Only 2x a year since this no not near me. I'm never disappointed. And they make coffee better than Starbucks!
Cake was awesome.  A little expensive, but cloud cake is a must try.

This is a great place to hang out with you friends, it is welcoming and comfy.
It has bunch of fresh bread and cake to taste, everything here is good. I may say it's a little pricy but regarding the location that's what you expect.
Also I didn't like much the coffes, I try iced and hot coffee, and it wasn't that good, I guess that's not their strong side.
We always stop by this bakery if we pass by South Park area. Nice place to hang out and have some pastries.
Great service!
Love love love this place
Great layout and great coffee.
This place is so cozy and has a huge variety of well made dishes. I would recommend the strawberry cloud cake and the yuzu danish. Really lovely environment!
Delicious macaroons

This cafe is an absolute delight! Cozy and inviting with a wonderful selection of treats. The atmosphere and service make it a go-to spot for relaxation and delicious indulgence. Perfect for unwinding with a cup of something sweet!
gas
All I can say is...if you haven't gone here yet..go!
Loved their pastries and Croquettes!
There is a nice vibe also good coffee and pastries, but the seating area is a bit too dirty.
I wanted to say a special thank you to these two girls who were very kind to us and made sure our evening at this restaurant was great

Super cozy bakery/ coffee shop. Great Variety of freshly baked goods: cakes, pastries, doughnuts, croissants. We didn't try their coffee but pastries were delicious! Also it's a very cozy aesthetic atmosphere inside! Go check them out.
Best hangout cafe spot with friends really good ambience.

Milk bread and green tea cake are the best.
I'm not even a sweet fan but these have the perfect amount of sweet.. the atmosphere and ambiance is
It was great in the building!
Didn't purchase anything this time, but everything looks delicious
Really good bread, would recommend for people looking for a place with good milk bread at a decent price (~$6). Vibe was really nice with upstairs seating in an overall nice area.
The best place, very good attention
Hands down my fave bakery!

If you are in the Charlotte area you MUST come to Tous les Jours bakery. They have tons of fresh goods in all sorts of varieties. They have a large selection of coffee, tea & other beverages as well. You can eat at the bakery or get as much as you would like to go. Everything is fresh and you can see the staff hard at work baking. Staff are courteous and helpful. Store is very clean and decor is chic! Great place to get cakes too!
The best pastries and cakes I've ever had!!!
Good bakery, not much to sit on if you have trouble with your knees.

The place is esthetically pleasing. Staff and food is another story.
They have 2 locations the other at Super G Mart in Pineville & same owners. Facility seems nice and clean. As a franchise most, if not all,  their products must be ordered from 1 place. Most of their items are ONLY  baked at the store. Not made on site as with some authentic bakeries. Some come in frozen then baked in store.
I tried Piedmont row location twice. Not going to waste $$ for a third time.
I made 3 different purchases in Pineville location non of items I purchased were good.
Some staff are nice but most are rude at both locations.
Unfortunately, these bakeries are over rated and over priced. I was so looking forward to a good bakery.
Nice, clean, spacious coffee shop, with decent prices and helpful staff.
Tastes good
Never disappoints

Great bakery, friendly staff, welcoming atmosphere; I was just very disappointed that they stopped serving beverages after 7 when they close @8.... I understand if the kitchen closes at a certain time but beverages? Like lattes and teas... then don't close @ 8 close @7. Doesn't look good as a business to provide selective service an hour before closing

Very good. If you're going to brand yourself as a French cafe/bakery, I was expecting more options. It likely was because we visited towards the end of the day that they were out of many food options; but what was available was tasty. I'll give it another try perhaps earlier in the day.
The food and drinks were amazing and the chairs were super comfy.
Very delicious pastries and friendly staff.
Cute and clean environment. They have more selection of breads and other desserts than Raleigh one. They also have large dine in area to have drinks with desserts.
Extremely good. Excellent tiramisu, bread, pastries. A must go place. You will find a wide variety of pastries and delicious things, everything is excellent.
Great experience
Awesome!
J'avais besoin de ca!   #merci

I went for the first time on Tuesday of last week and have been back 2 times since. You walk in the door and the smell of fresh baked goods are all around. The coffee, bakery options, and sweets are pleasing to the taste buds and eyes. Everything we had was delicious. My friend especially loved the tiramisu latte, I wanted to try it as well but passed since I'm dairy free.
A little different than your average French Bakery in that there are a few atypical selections and it is self serve but everything we had was good
Great place to enjoy a cup of coffee.

We got a cake to celebrate a birthday, and they gave us a plastic server and candles in a cute package!

Can't wait to return and try the pastries and sweet Chinese buns next time!
Great desserts but poor service. The cashier was so obviously tired and annoyed by customers. The only thing she told us was 23.75$. Same went for other customers.
Super delicious cake and breads! Milk bread with cream was the best.
Lots of great pastries to choose from. Not a lot of seating unfortunately.
Everything was delicious
Oh my goodness, so many yummy things to choose from! I'll keep coming back to purchase for my family & great neighbors!
Incredible selection and delicious! Loved the atmosphere. Please bring one of these to Greenville, SC!

I work close by and always stop by here. I love this bakery and it's products but the white lady who works there (I wouldn't called her by that if they had name plates on) was very rude. I went to the register and she kept on working on other things until this other white couple walked to the register and she came running saying are you ready to check out? I had to move out of my way and let them check out first. I was shocked how people can be rude like that. This guy on the second register called me and said he can check me out.
I will not be returning. No matter how good their products are, if you are bad at customer service/ racist it instantly kills anyone's mood.

This place is beautiful and the treats i had were delicious.

I hope one day they make the strawberry milk bread without any cream filling. it would be perfect to take home then.
I LOVE the cakes here! It's not overly sweet and their cakes are so fluffy! I'm so happy they now have two locations that will satisfy my sweet cravings.

Ordered a few desserts and two coffees. We were waiting for our coffees and realized I was missing a dessert. I thought the lady that took our order needed time to get it. Turns out, she completely forgot and couldn't get her attention. The cashier did not ask for here or to go. We were waiting for our coffees and realized they had them sitting there without even calling it out. The lavender latte I did not finish because it was too sweet.  as for the bread cake in the bag, was not good either. the strawberry croissant was good though. The chocolate cloud was alright.  Definitely would check out other dessert places.
Delicious every time! The drinks are good as well.
Really enjoyed the food, but why serve everything on paper plates and in paper cups. It would feel much more authentic and better for the environment to serve them on China plates and tea cups.
Amazing variety of pastries and the caramel macchiato was splendid. Our new favorite spot
This bakery offers a wide variety of delectable pastries and savory treats to choose from.
Great food and drink selection. I always use their coffee beans for my espresso machine at home. Recommend the Tiramisu latte with oat milk and cloud cake is always a good choice!
First time in this bakery and was wonderful. Cute quaint and bright. I didn't eat at the store as it was time to go but when I got home, I ate the bread with the sweet cream in it. It was fantastic.
Bury me with some of the honeydew bread when I did.

Absolutely fantastic atmosphere, lovely staff and my latte was perfect. The sheer selection of items is overwhelming in the best way; this is a true celebration of bread and coffee, distilled to Sunday morning perfection; though you'd be good to come at anytime. Highly recommend the Yuzu pie (it's like a flaky lemon pastry) if you're craving something sweet. Use the brown sugar sweetener if you're gonna add anything to your coffee!

Freshly baked goodies and great coffee.
We had a great visit and couldn't pick our favorites out of their great variety of pastries. Macaroons are so delicious here.

I went here because I follow their Instagram and always wanted to try it. The croissants are very good and so was the coffee. BUT i  was immediately disgusted when I sat down and there were ANTS EVERYWHERE. on the floor was a trail of them and on the table as well. Some crawled into my food tray so I couldn't eat much of it. And the FRUIT FLIES. As being a hyped cafe/bakery I feel like you should be able to at least sweep before opening as well. The ants everywhere made me completely lose my appetite.
Out of most stock, kind of high priced
I believe this is the best bakery in Charlotte
Amazing place to check out if you live or are visiting Charlotte! When you thinking bakery, aesthetic, coffee, you'll think of this place.
Bread heaven and coffee shop. All the fresh Pastries you want. Gotta go here!
Absolutely the best bakery ever! Super fresh bread and pastries daily! Love their cakes!! Must try!!

Such a cute place! Sweet staff and the food was absolutely delicious. My family & I grabbed a couple things after having dinner at Mal Pan. I got a slice of green tea cream cake, we also got a slice of cloud cake & a few other tasty treats. I can't wait to go again!
Stunning place with excellent baked goods and coffee. Worth the trip.

What can I say, I love this place! Their honey toast is my favorite. So simple but satisfying and delicious. There's so much to choose from. Also, if you're craving cheesecake, they make a light and fluffy type. It's truly mouthwatering.
I went here over the weekend, and it is PHENOMENAL!! Everything is so fresh and baked to perfection! Not to mention beautiful! Highly highly recommend!!

There really isn't anything wrong with the quality of their food, but the main reason why I'm giving it only 3 stars is the service, and the mismatch between their prices and what you  get in return. Specifically, for indoor dining, we were served coffee in paper cups, and their plates were plastic. Any decent place that charges even average, let alone higher pricing, should be able to afford proper, ceramic cups and plates.  On three different occasions, service was painfully slow, and that's just too much of a coincidence.

We're from out of town and decided to swing by mid afternoon, and they were sold out of almost everything. The bread stand and shelves were empty, and no plans to restock for the day. Only drink, whole cakes, a few loaves and macarons to pick from. Really disappointed to not have options (bread and pastries) and was a waste of time to drive out of our way. The cashier was telling me it was normal for them to not have enough bread and they don't have inventory to restock.
I just bought it yesterday and it's moldy today.

Immaculate atmosphere. Cozy places to sit, nooks, different seating styles. The pastry is shipped in from Korea and baked in house. Flavors and textures are all delicious. Flaky, vibrant, balanced. My favorite pastry was the kimchi croquette. Seriously delicious.
Best place to buy red bean bun/milk bread/milk bun. And also They have the best Green tea cake. Just make sure to go before 3:00 pm as they are sold out fast.
Loved the ambiance, coffee and their deserts.

Nice & clean inside with lots of options. It would be nice if they offered to-go bags (maybe clear ones so the cashier could see the goods) so that you wouldn't have to transfer at the register. Idk the process here but I asked for one when I was checking out & she literally laughed when I used the tongs to put it in there from the tray. I'm not sure what's so funny or if they emphasize on dining in. The Milk Cream Bread was delightful & I have yet to try the croissant
deserts
Amazing wide selection of pastries and deserts. Very friendly service and Tasty coffee.
Panera bread way better than this brand selling place

Very cute bakery! So many choices and everything looked delicious. We tried several different items. Including the honey lavender latte (which was really good). The croissants and breads were my favorites. The deserts aren't as sweet as traditional southern deserts. So, if you like that you would love this place. I would definitely be returning.

This place is great! Unfortunately no vegan pastries but I'd be stoked if they ever added some! They do have milk alternatives like oat, soy, and almond for drinks. The bakery has so many baked goods and cakes. So far my bf has tried a few things and each has been delicious. The inside is very inviting and there is a good amount of seating. Will definitely be visiting many more times.

My sister in law & her family took us here. It was our first time. We stop by around 10:30am. There was so much yummy breads, pastries, and cakes. Got a whole bunch of goodies for our road trip back home.

The cashier was absolutely wonderfully. Since it was my first time here I just asked the cashier to recommend me a drink. Surprisingly, the drink she recommended was very yummy.

Will definitely be coming back to this spot when we are in town.
Good place! Delicious breads!
Bought a couple of desserts and macaroons, and we were very satisfied. They were very tasty at a reasonable price, given the quality of each piece. Will come back!
Drove 30 minutes to go here  just for the UBE latte!!! I love it!! Soo soo happy you guys make it right.

Excellent ambience , I have tried Kimchi ,custard bun , mocha cake were delicious and all other breaded stuff were look too yummy , definitely  highly recommend place but hot tea is not up to the mark other than that very thing was delicious

This place is phenomenal! The decor and atmosphere were so modern and comfortable. All of the pastries we tried were delicious. We started things off with some familiar flavors like the chocolate croissant and almond croissant (which were so good that we bought seconds), but then we got into some flavors we were less familiar with like the Honeydew bread (it literally tastes like honeydew!). The experience of using the trays to pile on the different treats was so fun, especially with kids. We will be back soon!
It's a cute little bakery. Quite a schlep from South Blvd about a 2.5 mile walk from the train but worth it because the pastries are exquisite and affordably price.

Absolutely delicious visit!! This is probably the best bakery I've been to in Charlotte, so much better than Suarez and Amelie's. The prices are super affordable in my opinion for the high quality of the snacks offered. Their drinks were super nice too.

Their seating reminded me of Coco and the Director where they offered tables to sit at but also a giant stair like case with very comfortable pillows to sit on.

Definitely recommend the macaroons, I had a blueberry lavender that was to die for. The honeydew bread was so good too. Please give them a visit, you'll enjoy it!

The only thing I didn't like about this place is not knowing sooner. The pastries range from the perfect fluffiness of Asian bakeries to the delightful techniques of French bakeries. I dare say the bakers of Tous Les Jours are masters are their craft.
PS: Love the coffee as well. I'm not a big fan of "fruit notes" coffee so it was a pleasant surprise to get something delicious, yet simple.

This is such a cute and cozy restaurant. I come here to meet my lender friends or clients in South Park. The sweet and savory variety helped me balance my palate -- and everything was delicious 

Go give it a shot. I need to try their other location too
Wow!! AMAZING.

I visited this bakery a couple of times and had their delicious Pain Aux Raisin, Croissant and Caramel apple pie pastries. There's so many options to choose. I loved the location and friendly staff. It can be busy on late morning weekends but overall had a great experience!
Absolutely amazing cakes

The pastries and cakes are amazing here, my only issue would be the fact that they only have a microwave to warm things up, and not a toaster.  I don't want to make my pastry or my pizza soft and soggy in the microwave. Would it be too much to have a toaster?

They need to train employees well not to pack "overcharged" cakes like this. They must know how to make products look fancy if they are not able to make cakes as good as they should. Also, they are lack of professionalism serving customers. It is shameful that a good Korean brand hires such incapable and unskilled workers.

I wish I could try this place but they don't open until 8 so the only way to get anything fresh for breakfast is to be late for work.

This morning I was there at 5 minutes 'til 8 - they definitely saw me and another couple patiently waiting, but 8 am came and went and they made no effort even to acknowledge we were there. I left (don't have the patience for a place with that level of disregard for their customers) so no idea when they actually opened.
Freshly made pastries every morning. Great place and wonderful service and atmosphere.
So cute! Amazing pastries at a great price. Love the Tiramisu latte!
I've had the worst experience buying from this place. I've found plenty of hair on my piece of cake as seen at the picture. Please be aware

This location has really delicious cakes and other goodies. If you go earlier in the day there is a lot more selection then if you go at the end of the day. There is plenty of seating areas. We parked in the garage. The only downside is that it is expensive.
By far the very best dessert I've ever eatin!

Delicious macaroons. The chocolate was the best. So soft, fluffy, delicious flavor. The pistachio was so light and yummy. The cookies and cream was so sweet and fluffy and creamy. The salted caramel was my least favorite. The service was nice. They were about to close but the young man who took our order didn't rush me.he was nice and helpful.
Delicious food and rotating bakery! I love coming here
Absolutely love coming here! Everything we've tried, we've loved. Possibly our favorite bakery in CLT.

Muy delicioso todo....y la atencion muy buena ...todos muy amables...
Las instalaciones muy bonitas y organizadas....

Lo recomiendo al 100% muy buen ambiente, comodo y limpio
I recommend it 100% very good environment, comfortable and clean

This is not a place to fellowship with friends or read a book, music blasting from the speaker to the point the girl taking our order could not hear us well. Ordered 6 drinks, got only 4 and 1 of the 4 was incorrect, the other 2 they "lost". And finally, I will never take any coffee shop that serves drinks in paper cups seriously!
My favorite is the earl gray macaron, cappucino with oat milk, and the cloud cake with strawberries.

While the website touts that baked goods are baked fresh every day, I'm fairly certain that some of their items are baked from frozen and not baked from scratch. The items I tried were yummy, but I have some concerns. While I was being rung up, a flying bug landed on one of my croissants and I ended up not getting it. Also, while my friend was waiting for her latte, we noticed the girl making the drinks had stuff flaking on her lips and my friend was afraid it would fall in her drink as it was being made. I probably won't be back.
Awesome pastries,  great vibe, enjoyed it

Tous les jours in Charlotte, NC is a hidden gem that should not be missed! The bakery offers a wide variety of freshly baked goods that are absolutely delicious. From croissants and baguettes to cakes and pastries, everything is made on-site and with high-quality ingredients.

The service is always friendly and efficient, and the atmosphere is cozy and inviting. I especially love the selection of unique and exotic pastries that you don't often find at other bakeries.

I highly recommend trying the Mont Blanc or the strawberry cloud cake, they are both absolutely heavenly! The prices are also very reasonable, making it a great spot for a quick and satisfying breakfast or lunch. Overall, Tous les jours is a must-visit for anyone who loves good food and great service.
So amazing place
Such a welcomed addition to the neighborhood! We love it here!!!
All I can say is WOW !

We visited the Charlotte NC location and it is FABULOUS! Their selections are unlike anything you have experienced, reminding one of offerings in old-time bakeries. Quite pricey but worth every penny. Enjoy!
The milk cream bread is our absolute favorite--so delightfully soft and has a delicious custard filling! We loved this bakery when we lived in Houston and are so happy there is one in Charlotte.
Highly recommend, the atmosphere and staff are wonderful, but more importantly, everything they have is fabulous. Try the honey lavender macchiato!
Very trendy location and all the goodies are so delicious!

Staff is helpful and love that they don't crowd you. The food is FABULOUS!  I do wish they would open earlier than 8am.
The cake attached was gorgeous and very tasty.
This place is phenomenal! Such nice pastries, breads, coffee, etc. I would recommend for a any breakfast type of events. I have been here a couple times and I am always impressed.
It's the place to go when craving for excellent bakery menu
Good coffee
The carbs were delicious!  Unfortunately, they don't know how to make a cappuccino.
Delicious pastries. The macarons are cloud like and full of flavor.
I like the place, it's different. Delicious bread. My daughter loves the cookies.
